title: Commit to Your LD
report: Commit for 2019 to connect with your LD. Attend the monthly meetings and get involved. We need to work in 2019 to make 2020 happen! Click on the link above and find your LD. Then, Google for your LD website to find the monthly meeting dates and how you can help. All LDs have many opportunities for volunteering.

title: Support AZ DLCC
description: Help elect Democrats in the AZ House and Senate.
report: Help Democrats gain the majority in 2020. Republicans control both chambers of the AZ state legislature, but we're here to change that. Click on the link above and sign up today. Join us-The work for 2020 has already begun.

title: Write Postcards
report: We are asking volunteers to commit to writing at least 50 postcards. We provide the postcards, script, and you provide the stamps. We are specifically writing the postcards to remind Dems to get on the early Voter List.Click on the link or email Ephraim at einfante@azdem.org to get started!

title: Put Up Yard Signs
report: Excited to show your neighbors how much you support State Senate candidate Christine Marsh, Rep. Aaron Lieberman, and Rep. Kelli Butler? Fill out this form to order your own yard signs for 2020! Want to help deliver and install signs? Contact lrodriguez@azdem.org!

title: Help Elect Dems
report: Join us every Saturday at 10am! Our launches begin with updates from Rep. Butler, Rep. Lieberman, and 2016 AZ Teacher of the Year Christine Marsh and also include training for those who need it -- no prior experience is required. This is going to be an incredibly close election and we need you. Can't wait to see you Saturday morning

title: Connect via Zoom
report: Saturdays at 2pm: Help elect Christine Marsh, Kelli Butler, and Aaron Lieberman by connecting with your neighbors, friends, and family about our candidates! Sign up at the link above.

title: Support Mark Kelly
description: Be Part of a Virtual Reception
report: Join us for a virtual reception with Mark Kelly Democratic candidate for U.S Senate on Tues, Sept 8th, 5:00-6:00 PM AZ Time. We will send a second Democratic Senator to Congress when we help to elect Mark Kelly. Click on the link above.

title: Be a Poll Worker
report: Our democracy needs you-sign up to be a poll worker on Nov 3rd. Poll workers are essential to our deomcracy. They play a critical role in ensuring that our elections run smoothly. Click on the link above to begin the process.

title: ActNowAZ
description: Click here for a simple explanation of how the ActNowAZ App works!
report: Every Tuesday, your iPhone or iPad will ping with a notification of a specific way that we can help to deliver for Democrats in 2020. Open the App and you will have your action for the week. And, the actions and ideas for previous weeks will remain open, so check them out, too. Join us and make your voice heard and your actions matter.
